Text: Does anyone know where we can find matching English subtitles?
Excellent quality (even if it is 4/3). Thank you!

For English Subtitles for this torrent, use the link given by "songbite", then download Part 2, 3 and 4 (for House of cards).
Then do a search for "To Play The King" ad download parts 2 to 4 for "BluRay.x264-DEiMOS".
Finally, do the same for "The Final Cut".
